quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
quotes.author: Austin Freeman

quotes.quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: A good programmer is someone who always looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Do or do not, there is no try.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.quote: It’s not a bug – it’s an undocumented feature.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.
quotes.author: Grady Booch

quotes.quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Life is too short to code in bad languages.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: If you’re not failing every now and then, it’s a sign you’re not doing anything very innovative.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice. But, in practice, there is.
quotes.author: Jan L.A. van de Snepscheut

quotes.quote: It’s not about having the right opportunities. It’s about handling the opportunities right.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: There are only two hard things in computer science: cache invalidation and naming things.
quotes.author: Phil Karlton

quotes.quote: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.author: Theodore Rubin

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
